cells.data:
First off, I have discovered that  I have way too many obstacles in the obstacles array. 
Should have no more that 4 at any one time. Debug shows I have 12 at the moment.
2nd. It is showing the bot way too far away from all of them. Need a way to narrow down
the range to one then determining if the bot is on the burner of that one.

Think I will narrow it down by checking only the y position at first to see if the bot is in range.
Need to track the height of any given obstacle first.
